mapper.sql: id , id_number , batch_id , company_id , id_card_positive , id_card_opposite , name, formerName , pregnantPromise , pregnantWeek , thirdPregnantPromise , sex , birthday , age , nation , region , region_name , reservation_status , hall_status , union_approve_status_1 , union_approve_status_2 , police_approve_status , renshe_accept_status , cancel_status , accept_number , accept_address_id , accept_address , c_time , u_time , result_status , reservation_date , reservation_m, score, auto_test_num, reservation_time, reject_reason, materialStatus, is201826Doc
mapper.insert:
select t_identity_info_seq.NEXTVAL from dual
INSERT INTO t_identity_info ( id , id_number , batch_id , company_id , id_card_positive , id_card_opposite , name , accept_address_id, formerName , pregnantPromise, pregnantWeek, thirdPregnantPromise, sex , birthday , age , nation , region , region_name , reservation_status , hall_status , union_approve_status_1 , union_approve_status_2 , police_approve_status , renshe_accept_status , cancel_status , c_time , u_time , auto_test_num , reservation_time , materialStatus, is201826Doc ) VALUES ( ${id} , #{idNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{batchId, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{companyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{idCardPositive, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{idCardOpposite, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{acceptAddressId, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{formerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{pregnantPromise, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{pregnantWeek, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{thirdPregnantPromise, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{sex, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{birthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{age, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{nation, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{region, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{regionName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{reservationStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{hallStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{unionApproveStatus1, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{unionApproveStatus2, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{policeApproveStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{rensheAcceptStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{cancelStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{ctime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{utime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{autoTestNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reservationTime, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{materialStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is201826Doc, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_identity_info SET id_number = #{idNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , batch_id = #{batchId, jdbcType=INTEGER} , company_id = #{companyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} , id_card_positive = #{idCardPositive, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , id_card_opposite = #{idCardOpposite, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , formerName = #{formerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , pregnantPromise = #{pregnantPromise, jdbcType=INTEGER} , pregnantWeek = #{pregnantWeek, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , thirdPregnantPromise = #{thirdPregnantPromise, jdbcType=INTEGER} , sex = #{sex, jdbcType=INTEGER} , birthday = #{birthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , age = #{age, jdbcType=INTEGER} , nation = #{nation, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , region = #{region, jdbcType=INTEGER} , region_name = #{regionName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , reservation_status = #{reservationStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , hall_status = #{hallStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , union_approve_status_1 = #{unionApproveStatus1, jdbcType=INTEGER} , union_approve_status_2 = #{unionApproveStatus2, jdbcType=INTEGER} , police_approve_status = #{policeApproveStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , renshe_accept_status = #{rensheAcceptStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , cancel_status = #{cancelStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , accept_number = #{acceptNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , accept_address_id = #{acceptAddressId, jdbcType=INTEGER} , accept_address = #{acceptAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , c_time = #{ctime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , u_time = #{utime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , result_status = #{resultStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , reservation_date = #{reservationDate, jdbcType=DATE} , reservation_m = #{reservationM, jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score, jdbcType=INTEGER}, auto_test_num = auto_test_num - #{autoTestNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, reservation_time = #{reservationTime, jdbcType=INTEGER}, reservation_date = NULL , preApprove = #{preApprove, jdbcType=DATE}, union_approve_1_et = #{unionApprove1Et, jdbcType=DATE}, union_approve_2_et = #{unionApprove2Et, jdbcType=DATE}, materialStatus = #{materialStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , is201826Doc = #{is201826Doc, jdbcType=INTEGER} , id = #{id} WHERE id = #{id}

where.if: AND (name LIKE #{queryStr} OR id_number LIKE #{queryStr} OR accept_number LIKE #{queryStr})
